Player History
Injured on 7/17/1966 with a Blister On Finger, out for 6 days...
Injured on 7/12/1967 with a Broken Jaw, out for 4 weeks...
Traded from New York (N) to Pittsburgh on 1/31/1968 (Going to PIT: C J. Bench, LF S. Braun, P R. Klimkowski, P B. Moose, P G. Nolan. Going to NYM: LF W. Stargell, P B. Veale)...
Had first career hit on 4/8/1969, off Dave Wickersham (CHC)...
Earned first career win on 4/8/1969...
Hit first career homerun on 8/24/1969, off Jim Lonborg (CHC)...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/10/1975 to a 3-year deal worth $3,000,500 per year...
Won World Series with New York (A) in 1976...
